dcterms:creator: Tobias Plötz
Stefan Roth
dcterms:description: The Darmstadt Noise Dataset (DND) is composed of images with interesting and challenging structures. Each image is cropped at 20 locations of size 512 × 512 pixels yielding 1000 test crops. Only these test images are provided; there are no images for training or validation.
dcterms:title: Darmstadt Noise Dataset (DND)

dcterms:creator: Marc Lebrun
Miguel Colom
Jean-Michel Morel
dcterms:description: RNI15 consists of 15 real noisy images. There are no ground-truth images available for this dataset.
dcterms:title: RNI15

dcterms:creator: Abdelrahman Abdelhamed
Stephen Lin
Michael S Brown
dcterms:description: The Smartphone Image Denoising Dataset (SIDD) is the largest collection of real-noisy images, consisting of 30k noisy images gathered from ten different scenes under different lighting conditions via five smartphone cameras with their ground truth images.
dcterms:title: Smartphone Image Denoising Dataset (SIDD)
